name: UIFocusItem
desc: An object that can become focused.

items.name: var canBecomeFocused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item can become focused.

items.name: var isFocused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the item is currently focused.

items.name: var frame: CGRect
items.desc: The geometric frame of the item.

items.name: func didHintFocusMovement(UIFocusMovementHint)
items.desc: Indicates to the currently focused item that focus movement might occur.
